note: Jake is located in Mushroom Desert (261, 184, -565)
you will need to bring an animal to him,
this is when you make an animal follow you
and lead the animal all the way to his house.
This can also be done with using someone else's animal
Do arachne until you get 72 spider essence
then put stars on a spider helmet.
Or use the Gold Forger garden visitor
as he will give you gold essence to star
a super cleaver (buy from Ophelia in the Dungeon Hub)
for 9 gold essence total.

and the Binghoe, unlocked after

from Zombie Slayer Level 2 and crafted

Remember the Snow, Lotus and Ender equipment set.
These are dropped from Watchers (0.5%)
you will need 9 of them to unlock
this in your Accessory Bag.
Keep in mind that it requires combat 20
to be used!

and fishing on jerry's island will
give you around 10k this will increase
by 0.2% each fishing level

Two ways to do this goal, easiest one is
forge, you will need Heart of the Mountain
4 to make this (4 Fine Jade, Amber, Amethyst
and Sapphire + 320 Sludge Juice
(Killing Sludge which are located
in Jungle) the other way is doing nucleus runs
This is unlocked from Hardstone
Collection 5 (150k),
to make the armor you will need
(480 Enchanted Hard Stone (276,480 Hard Stone)
Hard Stone is located in Crystal Hollows.
Place down t2 Hard Stone minions (costs 768 Hard Stone per)
with medium storages to help getting the resources.
Fuel that is permanent is Solar Panel
(50k Nether Quartz Collection),
Enchanted Lava Bucket (25k Coal Collection).
The Lava Bucket is easily obtainable by mining
the ore veins in the Crystal Hollows.
You get this from Moby in Mushroom Desert
for 5 Full Chum Buckets (Killing Sea Creatures)
and 15 Glowing Mushrooms (Breaking that
mushrooms that are glowing around the house Moby is in)
